doc:
George Melford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Melford 0 George H. Melford (February 19, 1877 – April 25, 1961) was an American stage and film actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. Often taken for granted as a director today, the stalwart Melford's name by the 1920s was, like Cecil B. DeMille's, appearing in big bold letters above the title of his films. George_H._Melford ( February_19_,_1877 – April_25_,_1961 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actor , director , producer , and screenwriter . Often taken for granted as a_director_today , the_stalwart_Melford 's_name by the_1920s was , like Cecil_B._DeMille 's , appearing in big_bold_letters above the_title of his_films .
